info.title: Police Officers Club API
info.description: API for the Police Officers Club mobile application supporting authentication, member management, chalet booking, swimming pool reservations, and payment processing

post.summary: Login with Phone Number / Resend OTP
post.description: Send OTP to phone number. If called again with the same phone number, it will resend the OTP code.

200.description: OTP sent successfully (or resent if called again)

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - too many OTP requests

post.summary: Verify OTP Code and Complete Authentication
post.description: Verify the OTP code sent to user's phone number and return authentication tokens with membership status

200.description: OTP verified successfully and authentication completed

post.description: Register a new member if they are not already a member

400.description: Invalid registration data or user already a member

post.description: Create a new subscription for a member with embedded invoice for payment

400.description: Invalid subscription data or user already has active subscription

get.description: Get list of available subscription options with pricing and details
Get current subscription status for the authenticated member

post.summary: Create a new swimming pool reservation
post.description: Book a swimming pool slot for a member.

400.description: Invalid reservation data or slot unavailable

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific swimming pool reservation.

post.description: Book a chalet for a member.

400.description: Invalid reservation data or chalet unavailable

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific chalet reservation.
Get paginated list of chalet types with detailed information including amenities, pricing, and dynamic content

get.summary: Get Available Time Slots for Type
get.description: Get available time slots for a specific type with pricing information

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Type ID to get available slots for

post.description: Create a chalet reservation using item ID and slot ID with embedded invoice for payment

400.description: Invalid booking data or chalet not available

403.description: User is not a member with active subscription

get.description: Get paginated list of swimming pools with detailed information including amenities, pricing, and dynamic content

get.summary: Get Available Time Slots for Swimming Pool
get.description: Get available time slots for a specific swimming pool with pricing information

parameters.name: poolId
parameters.description: Swimming pool ID to get available slots for

post.description: Create a swimming pool reservation with embedded invoice for payment

201.description: Swimming pool booked successfully with invoice

400.description: Invalid booking data or time slot not available

403.description: User is not a member with active subscription

get.description: Check if payment was successful for a specific invoice ID

parameters.name: invoiceId
parameters.description: Invoice ID to check payment status for

post.summary: Check User State by Phone Number
post.description: Checks if the user is a member and/or subscriber by phone number. Used on app open.

get.description: Get paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user with filtering options

patch.description: Mark a specific notification as read for the authenticated user

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: Notification ID to mark as read

get.description: Get all chalet reservations for the authenticated user with status filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter reservations by status. upcoming: upcoming reservations (default), past: past reservations, cancelled: cancelled reservations, all: all reservations

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific chalet reservation by ID.

get.summary: Get all user swimming pool reservations
get.description: Get all swimming pool reservations for the authenticated user with status filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter reservations by status. upcoming: default, past: past reservations, cancelled: cancelled reservations, all: all reservations

get.summary: Get single swimming pool reservation details
get.description: Get detailed information about a specific swimming pool reservation by ID.

200.description: Swimming pool reservation details retrieved successfully

get.description: Get paginated list of news items with basic information for listing view
Get detailed information about a specific news item including HTML content

post.description: Generate payment link for subscription payment processing
Generate payment link for swimming pool booking payment processing
Generate payment link for chalet booking payment processing

get.description: Retrieve the current booking terms and conditions text
Get paginated list of tents with detailed information including pictures, pricing options, and extra details
Get detailed information about a specific tent including its slots and availability

parameters.name: tentId
parameters.description: Tent ID to get details for

post.description: Create a tent reservation using tent ID and slot ID

400.description: Invalid booking data or tent not available

403.description: User is not a member with active subscription

post.description: Generate payment link for tent booking payment processing

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific tent reservation by ID.
Get all tent reservations for the authenticated user with status filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter reservations by status. upcoming: default, past: past reservations, cancelled: cancelled reservations, all: all reservations

phoneNumber.description: Kuwait phone number (8 digits or with country code)

resendAfter.description: Seconds to wait before resending OTP

hasSubscription.description: Whether the member has an active subscription

subscription_id.description: ID of the subscription option to create

numberOfYears.description: Number of years for this subscription

extraInformation.description: Additional information about this subscription option

hasSubscription.description: Whether the member has an active subscription

is_available.description: Whether this slot is available for booking

price.description: Price for this slot in KWD

value.description: Detail value (can be number, text, or null)

extraDetails.description: Dynamic extra details about the type

isAvailable.description: Whether this slot is available for booking

price.description: Price for this slot in KWD

availableSlots.description: List of available time slots with pricing

slotId.description: Time slot ID chosen for booking

isAvailable.description: Whether the pool is available for booking

price.description: Price per hour in KWD as string

value.description: Detail value (can be number or text)

extraDetails.description: Dynamic extra details about the pool

price.description: Price for this slot in KWD

isAvailable.description: Whether this slot is available for booking

availableSlots.description: List of available time slots with pricing

slotId.description: Time slot ID chosen for booking

paidAt.description: Payment completion timestamp (null if not paid)

url.description: Payment URL for completing the payment
Payment URL for completing the subscription payment

Payment URL for completing the payment

is_available.description: Whether this slot is available for booking

price.description: Price for this slot in KWD

value.description: Detail value (can be number, text, or null)

extraDetails.description: Dynamic extra details about the type

ChaletReservation.description: A chalet reservation containing complete chalet information and chalet-specific reservation details

isAvailable.description: Whether the pool is available for booking

price.description: Price per hour in KWD as string

value.description: Detail value (can be number or text)

extraDetails.description: Dynamic extra details about the pool

SwimmingPoolReservation.description: A swimming pool reservation containing complete swimming pool information and pool-specific reservation details

ChaletReservationInfo.description: Reservation information specific to chalet bookings

SwimmingPoolReservationInfo.description: Reservation information specific to swimming pool bookings

thumbnailImage.description: URL of the news thumbnail image
URL of the news thumbnail image

htmlContent.description: Full HTML content of the news article

isAvailable.description: Whether the tent is available for booking

extraDetails.description: Dynamic extra details about the tent

isAvailable.description: Whether the tent is available for booking

extraDetails.description: Dynamic extra details about the tent

is_available.description: Whether this slot is available for booking

price.description: Price for this slot in KWD

slotId.description: Time slot ID chosen for booking

admin_id.description: Admin ID who processed the reservation

qrcode.description: QR code URL for the reservation
